title: Construction of Four Storied Lecture Hall Building to cater to the additional student intake of the Faculty of Management Studies and Commerce, University of Sri Jayawardenapura
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education for the construction of a  four storeyed building for the University of Sri Jayewardenepura, for the above purpose at a total cost of Rs.137.30 million, and to complete the construction work within the stipulated time frame, was approved by the Cabinet.
